body.name: Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature Soft Feel Silicone Baby Bottles, Breast-Like Nipples, Anti Colic, Stain and Odor Resistant, 9oz, 2 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 36 mins
features: Our most breast-like bottle: Made from soft-touch, skin-like silicone, this squeezable baby bottle feels just like mom and provides baby with the familiar comfort and warmth of mom’s breast
Breast-like: Our soft silicone, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and flexes like mom for a comfortable feed and supports in the transition from breastfeeding to bottle feeding
Anti-colic: Sensitive Closer to Nature nipple with anti-colic valve reduces excessive air flow, so little ones ingest more milk and less air, preventing symptoms of colic
Guaranteed no leaks: Easy to assemble and guaranteed no leaks when feeding your baby. The included lid and travel disc prevent spills or leaks when on the go
Mom recommended: 95% of moms would recommend Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature bottles to others
body.description: So, its our award-winning** breast-like nipple that you and baby love, but now you can combine it with our most breast-like bottle. When you are looking for a bottle that is the next best thing to you, this is the one! Made from soft-feel silicone that allows the warmth of the milk to be felt by baby and the softness that feels like a breast so your baby will be comforted when you are not an option.Loved by moms and babies, our easy latch-on, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and mimics the natural flex and movement of a mom's breast for a comfortable feeding. 95% of moms reported that their baby accepted the super soft silicone nipple with skin-like feel and would recommend to others. *All Closer to Nature bottle nipples feature an anti-colic valve to prevent the symptoms of colic by ensuring your little one ingests more milk and less air. Together with the bottles sensitive valve, the wide bottle neck encourages your babys intuitive feeding action. Designed to be held in the most natural position during feeding, the compact shape of the bottle also allows baby to be closer to you.The anti-static silicone coating keeps the bottle clean and hygienic by repelling dust particles and wont retain any stains and odors left behind by breast milk or formula. The wide neck bottle makes cleaning easy, and the bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave, sterilizer and bottle warmer. Easy to assemble and guaranteed no leaks when feeding your baby with an included lid and travel disc to prevent spills or leaks when on the go. 100% BPA, PVC and Phthalate free for your ultimate reassurance.Our Soft Feel Silicone Bottles are only compatible with our range of Closer to Nature nipples - available in a range of flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. We recommend changing your bottle nipples every two months or if they get damaged, weak or bitten by tiny teeth. * Based on 2021 study of 524 parents who use Tommee Tippee bottles. **Made for moms March 2020

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspired by mom When you are looking for a bottle that is the next best thing to you, our Closer to Nature silicone bottle is the one. The squeezable, skin-like silicone base allows the warmth of the milk to be felt by baby and the softness that feels like a breast to comfort your baby when you are not an option. Award-winning breast-like nipple Shaped like a breast because babies prefer it that way. The breast-like shaped nipple allows babies to latch on easily and supports the transition between breast and bottle. Super-soft silicone The squeezable base of this baby bottle is made from super-soft, skin-like silicone which replicates the feeling of the breast and is easy for baby to grip when they are learning to hold their own bottle.

Anti-Colic valve The Closer to Nature nipple with anti-colic valve reduces excessive air flow, so little ones ingest more milk and less air, preventing symptoms of colic. No leaks Easy to assemble and guaranteed no leaks when feeding your baby. The included handy travel lid saves any messes and stresses by ensuring your silicone bottle won’t leak when you are on the go. Easy hold Can be held in 3 ways-- cradled comfortably in the hand, gripped in the same way as a traditional wide neck bottle, or held from the base, making feeding comfortable for everyone.

Anti-static coating Our silicone bottles feature an anti-static coating which won’t attract dust and dirt when transporting the bottle in your bag. Stain and odor resistant Unlike other silicone bottles, our silicone bottle does not retain any odors or stains left behind by breast or formula milk. Easy clean & BPA-free The wide neck bottle makes cleaning easy and the bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and sterilizers. BPA-free for your ultimate reassurance.

Moving on If the bottle nipple collapses during feeding, it takes longer than 20 minutes for baby to finish a bottle, if baby tugs at the nipple or baby falls asleep mid-bottle, these are potential signs you may need to increase the nipple flow rate. As a guide we suggest extra slow flow, slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Change me Our nipples are silky soft. Change them if they get damaged or bitten by tiny teeth. Closer to Nature nipples are only compatible with Closer to Nature bottles and are not compatible with Advanced Anti-Colic bottles. Squeeze me When assembling your baby bottle, hold the nipple up to the light to check the slit in the silicone isn’t sealed closed. If it has, pinch it gently between your fingers or with nipple tongs to re-open. If the valve has sealed closed, your bottle won’t vent properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves these bottles!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these bottles and they are great! Easy to clean, easy for baby to attempt to hold (he’s little still lol), super easy to clean! Must have baby item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft silicone bottles
reviews.reviewText: I love these bottles! I've purchased both the 4oz and 8oz bottles. I've also bought the matching pacifiers. I wanted to get bottles that had a more natural feel. They are a soft silicone. Relatively easy for my son to hold. Easy to clean, although I have noticed there's a little raised area at the bottom of the inside where formula can cake up a little. But it's better if you rinse immediately after feeding. I highly recommend and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 Bottle & 2 Paci bundle
reviews.reviewText: These bottles and pacifiers are really great! They are soft and pliable like a mother’s breast. My granddaughter immediately took to both the pacifier and the bottle and she’s only five weeks old. She rejects most all pacifiers. . The nipple prevent too much air getting in so less burning and gas. . Tommy tippee is a brand that I’ve trusted from almost 40 years ago when my son was born. I got this bundle of 2 lg, 2 small bottles + 2 pacifiers.at a promo price of about $19.00. What a great deal, which made it even more desirable. However,, I would highly recommend them at the full price! I will buy again for gift-giving. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mixed feelings on these bottles
reviews.reviewText: I love soft they are and how easy they are to clean compared to the Dr. Bottles. I do not like how difficult it is to warm up the Bottles, it takes twice as long to warm up refrigerated breast milk because of the thick silicon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bottle for my picky breastfed baby
reviews.reviewText: My baby was exclusively breastfed for a little too long, so when we tried to introduce the bottle, she refused it. This was a nightmare for my husband when I would go to work. She was hungry, she would cry, but she would refuse every bottle he tried to give to her.We tried the avent bottles, comotomo, dr browns, mam, and the emulait bottle which was supposed to be the closest thing to a breast that we could find. We even got creative and tried feeding her with a syringe and a little cup. She refused them all. Finally, we tried this bottle, not expecting much, but for whatever reason my baby started drinking milk from these bottles little by little. At first it was just an ounce or two, but now she’s drinking 6 ozs from it in one sitting. So, if you’re dealing with bottle refusal, these are worth a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mi bebe es lactancia materna exclusiva, pero tambien toma leche materna extraida y de verdad estos biberones son una maravilla, no crean confusion pezon-mamila. Ella desde su 4to dia de nacida se adapto super bien y nunca ha rechazado el seno.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby loves these
reviews.reviewText: This is the only bottle he will hold. He takes all bottles, but will hold these indefinitely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are nice bottles I thought unfortunately my baby thinks otherwise

Aún no los he usado pero esta marca de bibis ya los usé anteriormente con mi hija, quería comprar los comotomo pero me dieron más confíanza estos por la marca el silicion creo que es un poco más firme que los comotomo pero están súper bien muy bonitos los chupones creo que son grandes para recién nacido pero habrá que probarlos 10 de 10
My son has been completely breastfeed for 6 months. I started introducing bottles and he took to them right away and I’ve never had any issues, really easy to clean as well! Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the design of these easy to wash / sterilise baby loves them the feel texture
These bottles are fantastic, soo easy to clean and have lasted with no discolouration at all. they flex well and are just brilliant.
